name: alice easey
detailedDescription:
A source of endless positivity, even when the world is falling apart.
Probably your best bet for survival in a zombie apocalypse.

inventory.name: vial
inventory.detailedDescription: A small glass vial. The type used to carry medical samples.

inventory.name: food rations
inventory.detailedDescription: A few days worth of rather dull but long-lasting dried food.

attributes.smell: There's hardly any smell to them at all. Just plain, grim and dry.
attributes.taste: Ugh. This stuff will do the job in an emergency but it's a lot like filling your mouth with carboard and foam packing material. Dry, tasteless and uncomfortable.
